title: Authorization Response
description: A message containing account information for the holder of that token

authorize.title: Authorization Response
authorize.description: Account information for the holder of the token

loginid.description: The account ID that the token was issued for

is_virtual.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether it is a virtual-money account

landing_company_name.description: Landing company shortcode the account belongs to

landing_company_fullname.description: Landing company name the account belongs to

scopes.description: provide scope of current token like read, trade etc

allow_omnibus.description: 1 for omnibus account, 0 for normal clients

account_list.description: List of accounts for current client

excluded_until.description: Epoch of date till client has excluded him/herself from website, only present if client has self excluded

is_disabled.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether its marked as disabled or not

is_ico_only.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether its ico specific account

is_virtual.description: Boolean value: 1 or 0, indicating whether it is a virtual-money account

landing_company_name.description: Landing company shortcode the account belongs to

loginid.description: The account id of specified account

sub_accounts.description: Sub accounts for omnibus account if any

loginid.description: The account id of sub account

req_id.description: Optional field send in request to map to response, present only when request contains req_id
